summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements. REQ-26 (backend admin system) is implemented in main.mo with admin list management and access control. REQ-27 (AdminDashboardPage) is created with organized navigation to all admin features. REQ-28 (App.tsx routing) adds /admin route with proper guards. REQ-29 (AdminGuard) is updated to verify admin status with backend checks and show access denied messages. REQ-30 (Layout header) shows Admin Dashboard link for verified admins. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.
